name: Unity New Forum Dark
description:
For people who want to be able to read the forum without getting blinded or having to scroll for miles between posts.

Version 0.5.1

Features:
- Dark skin
- No empty space at all
- Signatures are clearly separated from the post and are grayed out
- Bigger profile pics
- Fixed their broken image upload form and some other bugs
